title: Game freezes at champion select

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
When entering champion select in ranked mode, since the last week, my timer goes down to zero without showing me what's going on. Screenshot here: https://imgur.com/a/StL4k

I can see in chat that other players join the lobby, and then left the lobby, while my screen stays stuck on the timer going to 0, and no buttons showing up.

I've been experiencing this bug persistently, even after repatching, re-installing etc. Help?

The only mode I've been able to play is ARAM because it doesn't require pressing a button to ban or select a champion. The rest of the game works flawlessly with no lag, so seems to only be a bug with champion select screen.

replies.body: It doesn't seem like this is an issue with your version of the client since those ARAM matches are able to go through just fine. It's most likely an issue where your network is having problems getting connected to the game servers where normal/ranked games are played. Check out our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) and run through those steps, paying extra attention to the steps on Port Forwarding and DNS settings.
